description:
Luffy and the Straw Hats flash back to the heartbreaking story of Laboon the abandoned whale, and Brook`s battle with the zombie samurai reveals the reason behind his intense afro love!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Swear to Go See Him!! Brook and the Cape of Promise!
Je reviendrai te voir, sois en sûr ! Brook et le cap de la promesse
Kanarazu Ai ni Iku!! Brook to Yakusoku no Misaki
¡Nos volveremos a encontrar sin falta! Brook y el Cabo de la Promesa
Мы обязательно встретимся вновь! Брук и Мыс обещания
أقسم أنّني سأذهب وأراه! بروك ورأس الوعد
必ず会いに行く!! ブルックと約束の岬
